Name: luy-mohammadramadha
Author: Mohammad Ramadhan Sebwa, Ramadhan Hajj Ndeka, Ismail Were, Musa Murasi Salim Kukuya, Yusuf Shiundu Malala, Yahya Wafula Ojwang, Haroon Albert Msah

Translations.Text: Ne balia abalasuubilanga okhubukanana ninafu mbu baboola mbu: “ shichila shina nibalakhwishilia Malaika nohomba khulole Nyasaye wefu,” toto bo belola emioyo chiabu okhuba abakhongo, mana nibaloba okhuloba okhukhongo
Iyanga yabalilola Abamalaika, Aboononi shibaliba nende obusangafu inyanga eyo tawe, nebaliboola mbu; “khure ehale nende eshinyasio shiakhulenjelekhwo shino.”
Ne khulirera koosi kalia akabakhola mubikhole mana khulikakhola shinga olufu lutumukhanga
Abandu bwomwikulu inyanga eyo baliba mushimenyo eshilayi nende habundu halayi
Ne inyanga yelikulu liliatikha, mana lirere amaleesi amanji, ne Abamalaika balishibwa mubunji
Obwami bwatoto inyanga eyo buliba 25. obwa Omunji wetsimbabaasi, ne iliba inyanga indinyu khubakhayi
Ne inyanga eyo omwononi aliluma amakhono kaye naboola mbu; “Manyanga endila injila halala nende Omurumwa.”
“Abayiee! Emanyanga ekhaya okhukhola lebe okhuba omwitsa wanje.”
“ Toto ye yangosia ndalekha okhuloonda amebaalo nikamalile okhunzulila” ne toto shetani asukunanga Omundu
Ne Omurumwa yaboolanga mbu; “Ewe Nyasaye wanje, toto Abandu banje bakhola Ikurani ino okhuba eshindu shialekhwa.”
Ni endisa nilwa khwakholela buli Omurumwa omusuku okhurula mubandu ababii. Ne Nyasaye wuwo ayela okhuba Omulunjisia nende Omukhoonyi
Ne Abakhayi nibaboola mbu; “shichila shina nakhaya ekhwishilibwa Ikurani yoosi lulala butswa.” Ni endio kho khunyoole okhutinyisia omwoyo kukwo, ne khwayihelasia obulayi
Ne shibalakhurerera okhuchelasia khwosi khwosi tawe halali khwitsa okhwishilia	obwatoto	nende okhukhurerera obukalukhasi obulayi
Balia balikhung’asibwa mafumama nibayilwa mumulilo, abo baliba habundu habii nende abakora muno injila
Netoto khwahelesia Musa eshitabu, ne nikhumuwa halala ninaye Omusiani wabu Haruni okhuba omukhoonyi wuwe
Nikhubaboolela mbu; “Tsie khubandu abayingasia ebimanyisio biefu. Mana nikhubasishia okhusishia khwene.”
Ne Abandu ba Nuhu, olwa bayingasia Abarumwa khwabasishia mumatsi, nikhubakhola okhuba eshimanyisio khubandu, ne khwarecheshela abonooni eshinyasio eshilulu
Nende A’d nende Thamud nende Abandu ba Ra’s (bolukoba) nende tsinzibulo tsindi tsinyinji etsiali hakari wabu
Ne boosi khwamuchelasiliakhwo ne boosi khwabasishia busishia
Ne totobo boolanga khulukongo olweshilibwa ifula imbii mana kho koo, shibalikhwo nibalulolanga tawe, halali bo shibasuubilanga okhulamusibwa tawe
Ne nibakhulola bakhukholelanga omubayo, “koo, uno niye owa Nyasaye yaruma?”
Toto ye yali ahambi okhukosia nende Abanyasaye befu, khukhayanga okhwisumilisia khubo. Ahambi hano betsa okhumanya nibalola eshimanyisio, ni wina owakora muno njila
Koo walolakhwo ulia wakhola obwikombi bubwe okhuba Nyasaye wuwe? Kho koo ewe wakhaba omulindi wuwe
Nohomba koo, oparanga mbu, abanji mubo bawulilanga nohomba bamanyanga? Abo bali shinga tsisolo, halali bo bakora muno injila
Koo shiwalolakhwo Nyasaye wuwo shingala yasalaasia eshiinikha? Ne	yenyanga	yakhashikholele okhwihotselesia halala, mana nikhukhola eliuba okhuba omwimilisi washio
Mana khushikhweselanga ewefu kalaha kalaha
Naye niye owabakholela eshilo okhuba ingubo ne tsindoolo okhuba shinga okhufwa ne nakhola eshitere okhuba shinga okhulamusibwa
Naye niye urumanga omuyeka okhuba amacheni amalayi tsimbabaasi tsitsie nitsishili okhuula. Ne khwishinjia okhurula mwikulu amatsi amalafu
Kho khulamusilie khuko eshialo shiafwa ne khunywesiekho khubilia abiakhwalonga, tsiosolo nende Abandu abanji
Ne	toto	khubwatoto khukabilanga(ifula ino) hakari wabu kho banyoole okhwitsulila, halali Abandu abanji bakhayilanga mubukhayi butswa
Ne khwenyanga khwakhayilile buli mulukongo Omwikanyilisi
Kho olawulila abakhayi tawe, ne oshilane ninabo khuyo (Ikuruani) okhushilana okhukhongo
Naye niye ungasinjia tsinyanza tsibili, ino niyamatsi amatorotoro, karusinjia obuloo, ne eyindi ino niya ichumbi, indulu ne narao eshikalilo hakari wako, eshikalilanga (okhusasania)
Niye owaloonga omundu okhurula khumatsi mana nakhukholela olwikho, (lwa matsayi) nende olwokhuteshania. Ne Nyasaye wuwo niwobunyali
Ne balaamanga abilali Nyasaye- ebilabakhoonya nohomba okhubakhola shiosi shiosi tawe, ne omukhayi niwokhutsia ebuleka khu Nyasaye wuwe
Ne efwe shikhwakhuruma halali mbu obe urera amacheni amalayi nende omwikanyilisi
Boola; “esie shebasabanga omurungo kwosi kwosi khukano tawe, halali ulia wenya okhutila injila itsia khu Nyasaye wuwe
Ne wisiche ulia wetsinyanga tsiosi ulafwitsanga, ne omwitsomie khutsifuma tsitsie tsindayi. Naye ayela muno okhumanya tsimbi tsiabasumba bebe
Ulia owaloonga likulu nende eshialo nende ebili hakari wabio, khutsinyanga tsisasaba, mana naleeng’ana khushisaala shishie. Nyasaye wetsimbabaasi, reba amakhuwa keke khubamumanya
Ne nibaboolelwa mbu; “Mwinamile Owetsimbabaasi” baboolanga mbu; “Ni wina Owetsimbabaasi? Koo, khwinamile ulia wokhulomesinjia ewe butswa?” Ne kabametelanga eshisinyo
Niwoluyali ulia wara tsing’ining’ini mwikulu, mana naramwo eliuba nende omwesi kumesanga
Naye niye wakhola eshilo nende eshitere ukhuloondana, khu ulia wenya okhwitsulila nohomba niyenya okhupa orio
Ne Abasumba ba Nyasaye, abachendanga khushialo mubwihotselefu. Ne Abasilu	nibaboola ninabo babakalusinjia mbu: “omulembe”
Nende balia abamalanga ebise biabu eshilo khulwa Nyasaye wabu, khukhusikama nende okhwema
Nende balia baboolanga mbu; “Nyasaye wefu! Khurusilieho eshinyasio shia Jahanam, toto eshinyasio shiayo nishilibaho butswa
Toto eyo (Jahanam) ni habundu abii okhwikhala
Nende balia olwabekhonyela shibekhonyelanga nende isasia tawe, ne shibakholanga obwimani tawe, halali babetsanga hakari wa ako
Nende balia abalalamanga halala nende Nyasaye wundi tawe, ne shiberanga Omundu wa Nyasaye yakana okhwirwa halali khubwatoto, ne shibakholanga obuyeyi tawe, ne ulia ukhola ario alonyoola tsimbii
Alametelwa eshinyasio inyanga yeyindukho ne alekhalamwo tsinyanga tsiosi natutuye
halali ulia witsa okhusaba eshileshelo, mana asuubile mana akhole abikhole ebilayi, abo Nyasaye alabakalukhanilia tsimbii tsiabu okhuba amalayi, ne Nyasaye ni omunji wabulesheli wetsimbabaasi muno
Ne ulia usaba eshileshelo nende okhukhola amalayi, toto oyo asabe eshileshelo okhusaba khwatoto khu Nyasaye
Nende balia abalarusinjia obuloli bwobubeyi tawe, ne nibabura khumakhuwa kabulamwo oluchendo babura nende eshironyo(eshiribwa)
Nende balia nibetsulisibwa tsinyali tsia Nyasaye wabu shibatsikalilanga amarwi nohomba shibatsiwofulilanga tawe
Nende balia baboolanga mbu; “Nyasaye wefu! Khuhelesie mubakhasi nende Abana befu babe basangasia tsimoni, ne okhukholele okhuba ebemilisi abaritsanga Nyasaye.”
Abo nibo balirungwa tsinzu(tsio Mwikulu) khulwa okhwisumilisia, ne balinyoolamwo eshiribwa nende omulembe
Balikhalamwo tsinyanga tsiosi, amawulushilo amalayi nende habundu halayi wokhwikhala
Boola mbu; “Nyasaye wanje shiyakhabatebele tawe khukhayanga okhuba okhusaba khwenyu, ne enywe mumalile okhuyingasia, kho (eshinyasio) shilaba butswa shiokhubanyoola.”
Twaa Syn Mym
Tsino ni tsinyaali tsie shitabu shinoosinjia
Kakhaba kario weyira omwene shichila mbu shibaba Abasuubili tawe
Ne khwenyanga khwakhabeshilie okhurula hekulu amangalimwa, mana amakosi kabu kehotselesilia amangalimwa ako
Ne nibuboolela obwitsulisio obuyiakha okhurula khu munji wetsimbabaasi beretsanga ehale ninabo
Toto bo bamala okhuyingasia, kholaano ahambi hano balanyoola amacheni kakalia kabakholelanga emibayo
Koo, shibalolangakhwo liloba, ni emimela chinga chia khwamesiamwo, chia buli imbia indayi
Toto mu ako khulimwo nende ameeko, halali abanji mubo shinibokhusuubila tawe
Netoto Nyasaye wuwo, niye Owamani, Owetsimbabaasi muno
Ne olwa Nyasaye wuwo yalaanga Musa, namuboolela mbu; “Tsia khubandu balia abamabii”
Abandu ba Firauni; (ubaboolele mbu) “Koo shimuritsanga Nyasaye tawe?”
(Musa) Naboola’; mbu “Nyasaye wanje esie eritsanga baletsa okhuyingasia tawe.”
Ne eshilifu shianje shilola obuliro, ne olulimi lwanje shilurumbulanga obulayi tawe, kho yilila (Oburume buno) khu Haruni
Nabo bali nende likhobo khwisie, kho eritsanga mbu balanzira
Naboola; “Shikalikario tawe, kho mutsie nende amangalimwa kanje, toto efwe khuli halala ninanyu khuwulilanga.”
Kho mutsie khu Firauni mumuboolele mbu; “Toto efwe khuli Abarumwa ba Nyasaye webiloonje bioosi .”
Mbu olekhule halala ninafu Abana ba Isarail
Naboola mbu; “koo, shikhwakhulela ewefu noli omwana, ne niwikhala mwifwe emika cholubaka lulwo?”
Ne nokhola eshikhole shishio shilia shawakhola ne noba mubalia abalakhupanga orio tawe
(Musa) naboola mbu; “Ndakhola ako, olwandali nendi mubandu balia abakora”
“Mana nebelukha olwandali nebarire, ne Nyasaye wanje yambeele laano obwami ne yakholele okhuba Mubarumwa.”
Ne obo nibo obulayi bwawumborolanga obwawakholela, newara Abana ba Israil mubusandi
Firauni naboola mbu; “Ne ni wina oyo Nyasaye weshialo shiosi?”
(Musa) Naboola mbu; “ Nyasaye Omulesi owaloonga likulu nende eshialo nende ebili hakari wabio toto nimuli abokhukhaaba abwatoto.”
(Firauni) Naboolela balia abali nibamubotokhane mumbeka wuwe mbu: “koo! Shimuwulilanga tawe?”
(Musa) naboola mbu; “Nyasaye wenyu nende Nyasaye wa bapapa benyu abaranjilila.”
(Firauni) Naboola mbu; “Toto bwene Omurumwa wenyu owabaruma enywe ni omulalu”
(Musa) Naboola mbu; “Niye Nyasaye webukwe nende Mumbo nende ebili hakari wabio, toto enywe nimuli abamanyanga
(Firauni) naboola mbu; “Niwitsa okhusuubila Nyasaye wundi ulali esie tawe toto nditsa okhukhola obe mubaboye.”
Naboola; “Koo! Kata nekhurerera eshindu shili mubwang’angu?”
Naboola mbu; “Nakhashirerekhwo, toto noli mubandu baboolanga obwatoto.”
Mana nasukuna indambushi yiyie, mana nikalukhana inzokha ilolekha
Ne narusia omukhono kukwe, mana nikuba omulafu tswe khubakuhenga
(Firauni) naboola okhuboolela abakhongo balia abamubotokhana mbu, “Toto uno ni omulosi umanyile muno”
“Yenya okhubarusia mushialo shienyu nende obulosi bubwe, kho muboola murie?”
Nibaboola mbu; “Mwehelesie ebise ye nende omusiani wabu, ne omure mwitokho habandu abakhung’asinjia Abandu”
Balakhurerera buli omulosi omukhongo umanyile muno
Mana nibakhung’asia Abalosi khubise nende inyanga imanyikhane
Ne Abandu nibaboolelwa mbu “Mumalile okhukhung’ana?”
“Khwakhaba khurio khwaloonda kabalosi nikali mbu nibo balashila”
Kho mana Abalosi shingala boola, nibaboolela Firauni mbu; Koo, khulanyoola omurungo nikaba mbu nefwe khushila?”
Naboola mbu; “eeh, ne khandi mwitsa okhuba mubalia abenjisibwa.”
Musa nababoolela mbu; “sukune ebiamwenya okhusukuna”
Nibasukuna emikoye chiabu nende tsindabushi tsiabu, nenibaboola mbu; “khumaani ka Firauni efwesa toto nefwe khulashila”
Mana Musa nasukuna indabushi yiyie, mana niimilaa bioosi biabachikhanga
Awo abalosi nibakalukhana nibenama nibasujuda
Nibaboola mbu; “khusuubile Nyasaye webiloonje bioosi
Nyasaye wa Musa nende Haruni.”

(Firauni) naboola mbu; “Mumusuubile neshili okhubasubula, toto ye niye Omukhongo wenyu owabechesia obulosi. Kho mwitsa okhulola, Nditsa toto okhuteta emikhono chienyu nende ebilenje bienyu buchikha, ne nditsa okhubabamba mwesi”
Nibaboola mbu; “obubii bubulaho, toto efwe khwitsa okhukalukha khu Nyasaye wefu”
“Toto efwe khusuubile mbu Nyasaye wefu alakhuleshela tsimbi tsiefu, shichila efwe khubeele bokhuranjilila okhusuubila”
Ne nikhufimbulila Musa mbu: “ rula nende Abandu banje ebise bieshilo, toto enywe mwitsa okhulondwakho.”
Mana Firauni naruma abakhung’asinjia Abandu mwitokho
“Toto bano ni omukanda omutiti”
“Nabo toto bakhusinyisinjia”
“Nafu khuli abanji ne khubaritsanga”
Mana nikhubarusia mumikunda nende tsisebele
Nende amabishilo nende habundu andayi
Ne endio, mana nikhuchelamia Abana ba Israil
Mana olwa eliuba liarula nibabalondakhwo
Ne olwa emikanda chibili chialolana, Abandu ba Musa nibaboola mbu; “toto efwe khutilwa”
(Musa) Naboola mbu; “Shikali kario tawe, toto Nyasaye wanje ali halala ninasi, toto yetsa okhulunjisia.”
Mana nikhufimbulila Musa mbu khupa indabushi yiyio khu inyanza” Mana nikabukhana, ne buli elubeka niba shinga olukulu olukhongo
Mana nikhureraho Abandu bandi balia
Mana nikhuhonokosia Musa nende balia abali halala ninaye boosi
Mana nikhusishia abandi abo
Toto mu ako khulimwo nende ameeko, halali abanji mubo shibasuubilanga tawe
Netoto Nyasaye wuwo niye Owamani Owestimbabaasi
Ne basomele amakhuwa ka Ibrahim
Olwayaboolela papa wuwe nende Abandu bebe, mbu; “Shina shiamulaamanga?”
Nibaboola mbu; “Khulaamanga ebifwanani tsinyanga tsiosi khubilamanga”
Naboola mbu; “Koo, bibawulilanga olwamubilaanganga?”
“Nohomba	bibakhonyangakhwo (nimubilaama)nohomba bibawumisinjia (nimukhaya okhubilama)
Nibaboola mbu; “(Shibikholanga ako tawe) halali khwanyoola bapapa befu nibakholanga bario.”
Naboola; “koo Mulolanga ebia mulaamanga ebo?”
“Enywe nende Abakofu benyu abaranjilila
Toto abo ni Abasuku banje(abamulaamanga abo) halali Nyasaye webiloonje bioosi
“Ulia owanoonga naye niye ulunjisinjia”
“Ne niye ulia undisinjia nende unywesinjia”
“Ne nendwala niye umboninjia”
“Ne niye ulifwisia ne alilamusia”
Ne niye wesuubilanga mbu alindeshela ebionono bianje inyanga yamurungo
Nyasaye wanje! Mbelesia amachesi kokhubusia ne unde halala nende abakholi bamalayi
“Ne	ukhole	embe	wokhuboolwa khubulayi nende Abandu balitsa inyuma.”
“Ne ukhole embe unyoola emikunda chobwokholo mwikulu”
“Ne oleshele Papa wanje toto ye yali mubandu bakora.”
“Ne olanzafia tsisoni tawe inyanga yabalilamusibwa”
“Inyanga eyo omwandu nohomba Abana shibilikhoonya shiosi shiosi tawe”
“Halali ulia wetsa khu Nyasaye nende omwoyo omulafu”
Ne likulu lilisitibwa khubalia baria Nyasaye
Ne Jahanam ililolosibwa khubandu ababii
Ne baliboolelwa mbu; “Bali hena balia abamwalaamanga?”
“Abalali	Nyasaye,	koo	banyala okhubakhonya nohomba bekhonye abeene?”
Kho balisukunwa omo abo nende abakhayi bandi
Nende omukanda kwa ibilisi kwosi
Baliboola- nibasolanangamwo mbu
“Khwitsuba Khu Nyasaye toto efwe khwali mubukori bwa habulafu”
“Olwa khwabakholanga nashilala nende Nyasaye webiloonje bioosi
“Ne shibakhukosia tawe halali aboononi balia”
“Kholano khubula abakhusabila”
“Nohomba Omwitsa Owatoto”
Abayie khunyalanga okhukalukha khwakhabeele mubasuubili
Toto mukano khulimwo nende ameeko, ne abanji mubo shinibokhusuubila tawe
Ne toto Nyasaye wuwo niye Owamani Owetsimbabaasi muno
Abandu ba Nuhu, bayingasia Abarumwa
Olwa Omusiani wabu (ulangwa mbu) Nuh yababoolela mbu; “koo shimularia Nyasaye tawe”
Toto esie khwinywe endi Omurumwa Omwisikwa
Kho murie Nyasaye ne muwulile
Ne shebasaba khukano omurungo tawe, omurungo kwanje kuli butswa khu Nyasaye Omulesi webilonje biosi
Kho murie Nyasaye ne muwulile
Nibaboola mbu; “Khulakhusuubila ewe ne ni abateshele nibo bakhuloonda”
Nibaboola mbu; “Emanyile shina akabakholanga
Ne okhubalwa khwabu khuli butswa khu Nyasaye wanje, Abayie mumanyangakhwo.”
“Ne esie shinditsa okhwilukhania Abasuubili tawe”
“Esie shendi shiosi shiosi tawe halali omwikanyilisi owa-habulafu
Nibaboola mbu; “Nolalekhana ninaafu tawe ewe Nuh, toto olaba mubalia balaswa amachina.”
Nuhu naboola mbu; “Nyasaye wanje, toto Abandu banje bayingasiye”
Kho busia hakari wanje ninabo okhubusia okhulayi ne uhabine esie nende balia bali halala ninasi mubasuubili
Kho mana nikhumuhabina ye nende balia bali halala ninaye musafina yitsule
Mana nikhusishia balia abatong’a
Toto mukano khulimwo nende ameeko halali abaanji mubo shibali bakhusuubila tawe
Ne toto Nyasaye wuwo niye Owamani Owetsimbabaasi muno
Babu A’di boosi bayingasia Abarumwa
(Betsulisie) Olwa Omusiani wabu Hud yababoolela mbu; “koo shimulamuria tawe?’’
Toto esie endi khwinywe Omurumwa Omwisikwa
Kho murie Nyasaye ne muwulile
Ne shebasaba khukano omurungo tawe, Omurungo kwanje kulisa khu Nyasaye Omulesi webiloonje biosi
“Koo, mumbakhanga buli khwitulo, eshitsulisio shiokhukhola kalia kabulamwo oluchendo
Ne mumbakhanga tsing’oba mpara mbu mulimenya tsinyanga tsiosi
Ne nimusera museranga nobufuru
Kho murie Nyasaye ne muwulile
Ne Murie ulia owabahelesia kalia akamumanyile
Yabahelesia emiruko nende Abana abasiani
Nende “emikunda nende tsisebele”
Toto ebaririranga eshinyasio shieyinyanga ikhongo
nibaboola mbu; “ni halala butswa awo, khwifwe nokhuchelela nohomba noobula okhuchelela.”
Kano shikalisa halali ebima biabandu bakhale
Ne efwe shikhulihebwa eshinyasio tawe
Mana nibamuyingasia, nenikhubasishia, toto mukano khulimwo nende ameeko, halali abanji mubo shibali Abasuubili tawe
Ne toto Nyasaye wuwo niye Owamani Owetsimbabaasi muno
Babu Thamudi bayingasia Abarumwa
Olwa Omusiani wabu ulangwa mbu Swaleh yababoolela mbu; “koo shimuritsanga tawe?”
“Toto esie endi khwinywe Omurumwa Omwisikwa”
Kho murie Nyasaye ne muwulile
“Ne shebeenyakhwo omurungo khukano tawe, omurungo kwanje kulisa khu Nyasaye Omulesi webilonje biosi.”
“Koo mulalekhwa nomulembe khukali hano khwinywe
“Mumikunda nende tsisebele”
Nende imimela nende mitende chie bibuli ebilayi
“Ne muyabanga mutsingulu tsinzu mukhwisangasia butswa.”
Murie Nyasaye ne muwulile
Ne mulaloonda amalako ka Abonooni tawe
Balia bakholanga obwonooni khushialo neshibakasinjia tawe
Nibaboola mbu: ‘‘toto ewe olimubalia abalokwa.”
Ewe sholi shiosi shiosi tawe halali Omundu butwa shinga efwe, kho rerakhwo eshimanyisio nikakhaba mbu oboolanga obwatoto
Naboola mbu : “ingamia ino ibe nende ebise biayo biokhunywa , nanyu mwesi mube nende ebise biokhutaya ebimanyishe.”
Ne mulayitilakhwo khububii tawe, eshinyasio shieyinyanga ikhongo shiaboolela
Halali bo nibayiira, mana nibaba bokhwiyitsulisia
Mana eshinyasio nishibeshela , toto mu ako khulimwo nende ameeko , halali abanji mubo shibasuubila tawe
Ne toto Nyasaye wuwo niye owa Amaani Owetsimbabaasi muno
Abandu ba Luti bayingasia Abarumwa
Olwa Omusani wabu (ulangwa mbu) Lut yababoolela mbu: ‘ koo! Shimuritsanga tawe?”
Toto esie endi khwinywe Omurumwa Omwisikwa
Kho murie Nyasaye ne mumuwulile
Ne shindenyakhwo omurungo khukano tawe, omurungo kwanje kulisa khu Nyasaye Omulesi webiloonje bioosi
“ Koo mukholanga eshifwolo abasaatsa khubasatsa?.”
“ Ne mulekhanga shia Nyasaye wenyu yabaloonjela khubakhasi benyu? Toto enywe muli abandu babura eshichelo
Baboola mbu; “Ewe Lut, nolalekhana ninafu tawe, ulaba mubalia abatafibwa”
Naboola mbu; “esie toto endi mubasinyisibwa muno nende eshikhole shienyu esho”
“Nyasaye wanje habine esie nende Abandu banje, khu kabakholanga kano”
Mana nikhumuhabina ye nende Abandu bebe boosi
Halali Omushiele khubalia abekhalanga inyuma
Mana nikhusishia abandi abo
Mana nikhubakwisilia ifula, ne ni ifula imbii muno yabekanyilisibwa
Toto mukano khulimwo nende ameeko, halali abaanji mubo shibasuubilanga tawe
Ne toto Nyasaye wuwo niye Owamaani Owetsimbabaasi muno
Abandu bomutsuru omukhongo, bayingasia Abarumwa
Olwa Shuwaibu yababoolela mbu; “Koo! Shimuritsangakhwo tawe”
Toto Esie endi khwinywe Omurumwa Omwisikwa
Kho murie Nyasaye nemuwulile
Ne shebasabaanga khukano omurungo kwosikwosi tawe, omurungo kwanje kulisa khu Nyasaye Omulesi webiloonje biosi
“Mwitsusie eshichelo obulayi, ne mulaba mubalia baleeminjia tawe.”
“Ne muchele khushichelo shili habwene”
“Nemulaleemilia Abandu ebindu biabu tawe, ne mulachenda khushialo nimukhola amabii tawe.”
“Ne murie owamuloonga enywe nende abiloonje biabura biosi”
Baboola mbu; “Toto ewe olimubalia abalokwa”
Newe sholi shiosishiosi tawe halali omundusa shinga efwe, netoto efwe khukhulola mbu oli mubabeyi”
Kho mana khukwisilie ebitonye bielikulu toto noli mubalia baboolanga obwatieli
Naboola mbu; “Nyasaye wanje amanyile muno akamukholanga.”
Mana nibamunyingasia, ne eshinyasio nishiboolela shieyinyanga yeshinikha. Toto esho shali eshinyasio shieyinyanga ikhongo
Toto mu ako khuli nende ameeko, halali abanji mubo shibali bokhusuubila tawe
Netoto Nyasaye wuwo niye Owamani Owetsimbabaasi muno
Netoto obo ni obwishio bwa Nyasaye Omulesi webiloonje biosi
Yeshia kano roho omwisikwa
Khu mwoyo kukwo, kho obe mubalia abekanyilisinjia
Mulusungo lwa olwarabu lwahabulafu
Ne kano kali mubitabu ebiaranjilila
Koo, shishiali eshimanyisio khubo mbu kano bakamanya abasomi ba Abana ba Israil
Ne khwishilinjia khuwulia ulali omwarabu tawe
Mana abasoomele, shibakhamusuubile tawe
Ne endi nilwakhwinjisinjia mu mioyo chia babii
Shibayisuubilanga tawe okhula shingala balola eshinyasio eshilulu
Mana shibetsele mapwoka, nabo nibalamanyile tawe
Ne balaboola mbu; “Koo; efwe khulahebwa ebise?”
Mana koo, bayungubalilanga eshinyasio shiefu
Olola orie nikhubamenyia obulayi emika eminji
Mana kabanyoole kalia akabalakungwa
Kalibakhonya	shina	kalia akabamenyelanga mubulayi
Ne sikhwasishia olukongo lwosi lwosi tawe nikhushili okhurumamwo Abekanyilisi
(Khu) obwitsulisio, neshikhwali abakhola obubii tawe
Ne ameshetani shikekha nayo tawe
Ne shibakhoyeshele tawe ne shibakhanyala tawe
Toto abo bekalilwa okhuwulila
Kho olalaama halala nende Nyasaye Abanyasaye bandi tawe wakhetsa waba mubalia banyoola eshinyasio
Ne wikanyilisie Abandu bobo bahambi
Ne ore hasi olubaha lulwo khu ulia okhuloonda mubasuubili
Ne nibalakhuwulila, boola mbu; “esie ndira ehale muno nende akamukholanga.”
Ne wisiche ulia owa Amaani muno Owetsimbabaasi
Ulia ukhulolanga olwawemanga
Nende okhukalukhana khukhwo olwa osujudanga
Toto ye niye Omuwulili po Omumanyi muno
Koo! Ebaboolelekhwo niwina wamashetani keshelangakhwo?”
Keshelanga khumuchishi Omukhongo Omunji wetsimbi
Kabayililanga kalia akakaulilanga, ne amaanji muko namabeeyi
Ne abakasinjia tsinyimbo nibo abakori abakalondangakhwo
Koo, shololanga mbu bo bayiyayiyanga buli mwitwoma
Ne mbu bo baboolanga akabalakholanga tawe

Halali balia basuubila, mana nibakhola amalayi mana nibetsulila Nyasaye muno, mana nibashila nibarunga olwa bali nibakholeelwe obubii, Ne bakholanga obubii bakhamanye ni omushukhano kuli kurie kwabalishukhana
Twa Syn, Tsino ni tsinyaali tsieyi Ikurani, nende eshibatu eshinoosi
Obulunjifu nende amakhuwa amalayi khubasuubili
Balia balumiililanga okhulaama (salah) nende okhurusia ishihanwa (izaaka) ,nabo bali nobusuubili muno bwo mwikulu
Toto balia balasuubilanga mwikulu tawe, khwabaronela ebikhole biabu, manabo bawofulilamwo
Abo nibo baliba nende eshinyasio eshibii, nabo mwikulu nibo balinyoola okhusikha muno
Ne toto ewe wechesibungwa Ikurani okhurula khuwamachesi, Omumanyi muno

(Itsulila) olwa Musa yaboolela Abandu beyinzu yiyie mbu; “Toto esie endutsi omulilo, bulano buri nditsa okhubarerera amacheni kali khumulilo oko, nohomba ndista okhubarerera eshichenga shiakhanga mwakhaba murio mwanyoola okhwora (omulilo)
Kho olwa yakulakhwo, yawulila omulango mbu; “Alinetsikhabi owuli mumulilo kuno nende ulia uli mundulo mwakwo, ne Nyasaye niwoluyali, Omulesi webiloonje bioosi.”
Ewe Musa- Toto esie nesie Nyasaye owa Amaani Owamachesi muno

“Ne sukuna indabushi yiyio” olwayayilola nimoolanga shinga inzokha,	yakalukhana	inyuma niyelukha, neshiyalinda tawe. Nyasaye namuboolela,“Ewe Musa olaria tawe, toto esie, Abarumwa shibabetsanga noburi imbeli wanje tawe.”
“Halali ulia wakhola obubii, mana nakalukhania obulayi habundu wobubii, Toto esie endi Omunji wobulesheli Omunji wetsimbabaasi
Ne Injisia omukhono mumufuko kukwo, kulakalukhana okhuba omulafu tswe bulali bwobubii tawe. Ni ndala khubimanyisio tisa bia Firauni nende Abandu bebe, toto abo bali Abandu abarula khunjila yanje
Mana olwa ebimanyisio biefu bilolekha biaboolela baboola mbu; “Buno ni obulosi obwahabulafu”
Mana nibabiyingasia khububii nende khubufuru ne emioyo chiabu nichimanyile muno mbu nitoto, kho henga indukho yabandu bakholanga obubii shinga yali
Netoto khwahelesia Daudi nende Suleiman obumanyi, Nibaboola mbu; “Oluyali nilwa Nyasaye owakhukholela efwe obulayi muno okhushila abanji mubasumba bebe abasuubili.”
Ne Suleiman nabukula habundu wa Dawud, ne naboola mbu; “enywe Abandu, khwechesibwa okhuboola khwa mayoni, ne khwahelesibwa buli eshindu, toto buno ni obulayi buli habulafu.”
Ne Suleiman nakhung’asilibwa omukanda kukwe kwabalwani okhurula mumajini, nende Abandu nende amayoni, nakwo nikureebwa mumikanda emikanda

Okhula shingala boola mwitwoma lietsindukusi, indukusi yaboola(okhuboolela atsiashie) mbu; “Enywe tsindukusi injile mutsinzu tsienyu, Suleiman nende omukanda kukwe kwe liyie baletsa babasena tawe, nabo nibakorerwe.”

Mana namwenya natsekha okhurulana nende likhuwa elo naboola mbu; “Ewe Nyasaye wanje mbelesie amaani ekhupe orio khutsimbabaasi tsiawambelesia, esie nende abebusi banje, ne enyoole okhukhola ebikhole ebilayi ebiawachama, ne unyinjisie khutsimbabaasi tsistio, mubasumba bobo abalayi.”
Mana nachenda nahenga amayoni, naboola mbu; kabelekarie endalalolanga Hud hud? Nohomba shililiho tawe
Toto nditsa okhuliwa eshinyasio eshilulu, nohomba nditsa okhulisinza nohomba limbelesie eshifune shilolekha
Shiyashinda muno tawe(Hud Hud niliula) niliboola mbu; “Enyoolele kamulamanyile tawe, ne ikhwitsile endi okhurula sabaa nende amakhuwa katoto.”
“Toto esie enyoolele Omukhasi niyabaruka naye yahelesibwa buli eshindu, ne ali nende eshisaala eshikhongo (shobwami).”
“Emunyoolele nende Abandu bebe nibeenamilanga eliuba mushilenje shia Nyasaye, ne Shetani yabaronela ebikhole biabu mana nabeekalila injila(ya abweene) khomana shibalunjikhanga tawe.”
Mbu khobaleshe okhwinamila Nyasaye owurusinjia akefisile mwikulu nende mushialo ne yamanya akamufisanga nende akamuretsanga habulafu
Nyasaye, abulaho ulaamungwa khubwatoto ulali ye tawe Nyasaye we shisaala shiobwami eshikhongo
(Suleiman) naboola mbu; “khulahenga khulole mbu nobwatoto nohomba oli mubabeeyanga.”
Tsia nende Ibarua yanje ino, mana obahelesie, mana awuleele, mana olole shabalakhukalusia
Naboola mbu; “Enywe abakhongo toto endererwe ibarua yoluyali.”
Irula khu Suleiman, nayo ni; “Mulira lia Nyasaye Owetsimbabaasi Owobukoosia.”
Mulaakholela obufuru tawe, ne muule ewanje mweesi nimumalile okhuba abaisilamu
Naboola mbu; “Enywe abakhongo, munjelele	khwikhuwa	lino, shindakhakhalaka liosi liosi tawe okhuula mumboolele.”
Nibaboola mbu; “efwe khuli abaamani, nende abobulwani abakhongo, ne okhubusia khuli khwiwe kholola liokhalaka.”
(Malkia) Naboola mbu; “Toto Abaami nibenjila mwitokho balinyasinjia, ne bakholanga Abandu boluyali mwo okhuba hasi, ne endio nilwabakholanga.”
“Ne toto esie nditsa okhubayilila eshisangasia mana eninde shiabarumwa baletsa ninasho.”

Kho olwa Omurumwa wuwe yoola khu Suleiman, Suleiman naboola mbu; “koo enywe mwenya okhukhonya nende omwandu? Ne kwayambelesia Nyasaye ni omulayi po okhushila okwayahelesia enywe. Halali enywe musangalilanga ebisangasia biabu.”
“Kalukhayo nende ishisangasia esho khubo, toto efwe khwitsa okhubatsiila nende	omukanda	kwabalwani okwabalanya okhwema nakwo tawe, netoto khulabarusiamwo, nibatonyele abateshele nibatutuye .”
(Suleiman) Naboola; “Enywe abakhongo ni wina witsa okhunderera eshisala shishie shioluyali nabashili okhunzitsila nibasilime.”
Ifrit okhurula Mumajini naboola mbu; “Esie nditsa okhurera noshili okhubukha oli hoa , esie toto endi nende amani kokhukhola endio ne endi omwisikwa.”

Ulia uli nende obumanyi bweshitabu naboola mbu; “Esie nditsa okhukhurerera noshili okhumetiametia (Okhutimba) tsimoni tsitsio, “kho olwa yalola nishirererwe imbeli wuwe naboola mbu; “kano nikhutsimbabaasi tsia Nyasaye wanje khoyandeme mbu ekhupa orio nohomba ekhaya, ne ulia okhupa orio toto ye akhupa khululwe omwene, ne ulia ukhaya toto Nyasaye wanje ni Omuyinda Omuhani muno
(Suleiman) Naboola mbu; “Mumukalukhasilie eshisala shishie shobwami shino khulolekhwo mbu alashimanya nohomba yetsa okhuba mubalia abalakhashimanya tawe

Kho olwayoola naboolelwa mbu; “koo eshisaala shiobwami shino shili shinga eshishio? Naboola mbu shili ngashio butswa, nafu khwechesibwa obumanyi nikhushili okhulola kano, na khumalile okhuba abasalamu”
Ne (Suleiman) namukania kalia akayalaamanga akalali ka- Nyasaye tawe, toto ye yali mubandu Abakhayi

Naboolelwa mbu; “injila munzu, olwayalola amunjila yapara mbu amatsi kaliwo, mana naninia ingubo yiyie nafimbula tsindenywe tsitsie, (Suleiman) naboola mbu; “Toto obo ni obwelu 27. bwakasibwa nende biwo”(Bilqis) naboola mbu: “ Nyasaye wanje esie ekholeele obubii omwoyo kwanje, ne esilimile halala nende Suleiman khu Nyasaye Omulesi webilonje bioosi.”
Ne toto khwayilila babu Thamudi owashiabwe Swalih, nababoolela mbu: “Mulaame Nyasaye” mana nibakalukhana emikanda chibili chisolananga
Naboola mbu: “ enywe Abandu banje shichila shina nimuyuyushilanga obubii inyuma wamalayi? Shichila shina nimulasaba eshileshelo Nyasaye mwakhaba murio mwanyoola okhubeelwa tsimbabaasi?”
Nibaboola mbu: “khunyoolele lisubilo shichila ewe nende balia bali halala ninawe.” Naboola mbu “ (ikhabi imbii yenyu) lisubilo lienyu lili khu Nyasaye , halali enywe muli Abandu bateemungwa.”
Ne bali mwitokho Abandu tisa abakholanga amahaka muno khushialo, neshibakasinjia liosi liosi tawe

Nibaboola mbu “ mwitsubanile khu Nyasaye mbu khwitsa okhumutsunushila eshilo khumusere ye nende Abandu baye, ne toto khwitsa okhuboolela Omundu waye (omuchelami wuwe) mbu: “shikhulutsikhwo okhusikha khwabandu baye tawe, ne toto efwe khuboolanga habwene.”
Mana nibakasia ebifwanga biabu nafu nikhukasia amakhuwa kefu, nabo nibalamanyile tawe
Kho henga shingala indukho yebifwanga biabu yali, toto efwe khwabasishia nende Abandu babu boosi
Kho etso nitso tsinzu tsiabu tsiatong’a tsikhaya shichila obubii bwabu, toto mukano khulimwo nende ameeko khubandu bamanya
Mana nikhuhabina balia basuubila nende balia bamuritsanga
Ne Lut olwayaboolela Abandu bebe mbu: “ mukholanga eshifwolo nimulola?”
Toto enywe mwinjililanga Abasatsa mubwikombi balali abakhasi tawe, toto enywe muli Abandu bakholanga obusilu.”
